attributes.action: Hold a referendum to withdraw the UK from EU membership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I, like many other people, wish to have the right to vote on the UK's membership in the EU.
I believe that the UK and it's citizens will be financially better off and that a lot of the ideas and legislation the EU has implemented could be adopted into and under our own schemes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
